map.noMapAvailable: There is no map available right now

boardgames.noGamesFound: No board games found. Try searching for something else.
boardgames.title: Board Games

error.login: Error in participant number or password

favorites.noFavorites:
You have no favorites yet.

With favorites, you can have a better overview of events you want to remember and have them collected in one place.

Press the heart icon next to an event in the program to add it to your favorites.

fastaWear.text:
Have you ordered wear?

It can be retrieved in the Information after you have checked in. State your name and participant number and you will receive your wear.
fastaWear.title: FastaWear

lostAndFound.text:
Have you lost or found something?
Go to The Information for help!
lostAndFound.title: Lost & Found

store3.title: Artist Alley popup shops @ Common Area

transportAndParking.text:
You can park at the school or sports center parking lot.

Hobro train station is approx. 2.5 km from Fastaval.
transportAndParking.title: Transportation & Parking

wifi.explainer: Once connected, enter your mobile phone number with + and then the country code in front of it, e.g. +49 for Germany. You will then receive an SMS with a code you need to enter to access the internet.
wifi.title: WiFi

alert.description: Are you ok with us sending you updates and notifications through this app? It is our only way to ensure that you are kept up to date on changes etc.
alert.title: Messages from Fastaval

login.helpText: You will find your participant number and password in your confirmation email.

permissionsWarning.description: We care about your privacy and data security. Please rest assured that the tracking this app uses is only for allowing us to send you notifications.
permissionsWarning.title: Dear user

more.socialMedia: Visit our social media and sign up for our newsletter
more.title: More

notifications.noNotificationsFound:
No notifications found.

Don't worry, you will be informed here if anything important happens.
notifications.title: Notifications

profile.breakfastText: Hearty bread, spreads, boiled eggs, fruits and vegetable as well as cereal with yoghurt, milk or skyr
profile.foodHandedOut: The food has been handed out
profile.noMessagesRightNow: Fastaval has no messages for you right now
profile.scanBarcode: Show the barcode when you go to collect your food

food.notOrdered: You have not ordered food at Fastaval
food.ordered: If there is no queue or you need to catch a scenario, you are welcome to collect your food between 17:30 and 19:30
